price: Da Ãdawa da Samũdãwa alhãli kuwa lalle alãmun azãba sun bayyana a gare su daga gidãjensu kuma Shaiɗan ya ƙawãta musu ayyukansu, sabõda haka ya kange su daga hanyar Allah, kuma sun kasance mãsu basĩra!
arabic: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَقَد تَّبَيَّنَ لَكُم مِّن مَّسَٰكِنِهِمۡۖ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَصَدَّهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَكَانُواْ مُسۡتَبۡصِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿādan wathamūdā waqad tabayyana lakum min masākinihim wazayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu aʿmālahum faṣaddahum ʿani al-sabīli wakānū mus'tabṣirīna
